verses.1: Hih hun pawl laitakin Herod Kumpipa in pawlpi mite pawl khat bawlsiat ding kipan hi.
verses.2: Johanʼ u James pen namsau tawh thatsak hi.
verses.3: Hih bangin thahna hangin Jew mite a lungdamna a theih ciangin Peter zong mansak leuleu hi. (Hih pen Silngo Sawh loh Anlum Pawi hunsung ahi hi.)
verses.4: Peter a kimat khit ciangin thong ah kikoih a, galkap li ciat a om galkap pawl lite in a cin dingin ki-ap hi. Herod in Paisan Pawi a ven ciangin mipi mai ah Peter thu sit dingin a ngaihsut ahi hi.
verses.5: Tua ahih manin thong sungah Peter kikhum a, ahi zongin pawlpi mite in lungsim takpi tawh ama adingin Pasian kiangah thu a ngetsak uh hi.
verses.6: Herod in Peter thu sit dingin a lakkhiat ding ma a zan sungin, Peter a khut nih tuakin sikkhau kikhihin alang tuakah galkapte in lenin tua galkap nih kikalah kilumsak a, tua banah thongcingte in a kongah cing lai uh hi.
verses.7: Thakhatthu-in Peter gei ah Topaʼ vantungmi khat hong omin thong sung khempeuh khua a vak hi. Vantungmi in Peterʼ liangko lokin phong a, “Manlangin tho in,” a ci hi. Thakhatin Peterʼ khut panin a sikkhaute kitol khia hi.
verses.8: Tua ciangin vantungmi in, “Na kawng hoihtakin gakin na khedap bulh in,” ci-in a gen bangin Peter zong a gamta hi. Tua ciangin vantungmi in, “Na puan silh inla hong zui in,” a cih mah bangin,
verses.9: thong sung panin Peter in amah zui-in a paikhia hi. Ahi zongin tua vantungmiʼ gamtatna pen ahi takpi mah ahi hiam cih thei lo ahih manin maang a mu-in kingaihsun hi.
verses.10: Thongcingteʼ vilna mun a khatna le a nihna a khen khit uh ciangin khuapi sung lut nading sik kibawl thong kongpi a tung uh hi. Tua kongpi pen ama thu-in hong kihong tawm a, amaute a paikhia uh hi. Khua sung lampi ah a pai laitakun thakhatin vantungmi in Peter guak a nusia hi.
verses.11: Tua ciangin Peter in khua phawk a, “Maang a mu ka kisak leh a takpi na hi mawk! Topa in a vantungmi kei kiangah hong sawl a, Herod in hong gimsak nading le Jew mite in gimna hong thuaksak nading panin kei hong hon khia hi,” a ci hi.
verses.12: Hih thu a phawk khit ciangin Johan Marka nu Mary’ inn ah a pai hi. Tua lai ah mi tampi kikhawmin thu a na ngen uh hi.
verses.13: Peter in inntual kongpi hong kiu a, a en dingin nasem numei Roda va pai hi.
verses.14: Peter hi, ci-in a aw-in a theih ciangin nuam lua ahih manin inntual kong nangawn hong loin inn sungah va tai a, inntual kongah Peter ding hi, ci-in a va gen hi.
verses.15: Amaute in, “A hai hi teh!” na cih san lel uh hi. Ahi zongin amah in, “Peter a om taktak mah hi,” a cih teitei ciangin amaute in, “Amah a cing vantungmi hi ding hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
verses.16: Tua sung tengin Peter in a kong mah hong kiukiu lai a, a tawpna ah a hon uh ciangin Peter ahih lam thei uh ahih manin lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
verses.17: Amaute a pau nawn loh nadingun Peter in a khut van a, thong sung panin Topa in amah a paikhiat pihna zia teng a gen hi. Tua ciangin, “James le pawlpi midangte kiangah hih thu na gen un,” ci-in a vaikhak khit ciangin mun dangah a paikhia hi.
verses.18: Zingsang khua a vak ciangin Peter bangci ahi hiam, ci-in thongcingte lakah buaina lianpi hong om hi.
verses.19: Peter a zon nadingun Herod in thu pia a, ahi zongin mu zo lo uh hi. Tua ahih manin thongcingte thu kisit a, thah dingin thu a khen nadingun thu a pia hi. Tua ciangin Judea gam panin Sisaria khua ah Herod pai suk a, tua lai ah tawl khat sung a om hi.
verses.20: Taia khua mite le Sidon khua mite tungah Herod heh mahmah ahih manin Herod tawh a kimu dingin hih khua nih mite hong pai khawm uh hi. A masa-in kumpi inn sunga ulian nasem ahi Blastus a pawlmat phot uh hi. Hih khua nihteʼ an nek tui dawn pen hih kumpipaʼ gam panin a ngah uh ahih manin Blastus makai sakin Herod kiangah va pai-in kilem nading thu a va gen uh hi.
verses.21: Kumpipa in a thugen hun ding a ciam kholh ni a tun ciangin a kumpi puan silhin a kumpi tokhom tungah tu a, mite tungah thu a gen hi.
verses.22: Mite in a thugen a zak uh ciangin, “Hih thugen pen mihing hi loin pasian ahi hi,” ci-in a awng uh hi.
verses.23: Herod in mite, Pasian phatsak loin amah phatsak ahih manin thakhatin Topaʼ vantungmi in Herod cinasak a, a hut in amah netumin a si hi.
verses.24: Ahi zongin Pasianʼ thu kizelin a khang semsem hi.
verses.25: Barnabas le Saul in a nasep a man khit uh ciangin Jerusalem khua panin ciahkik uh a, Johan Marka zong a ciahpih uh hi.
